locations.name: Rio de Janeiro
locations.description: Iconic Brazilian city famed for its Christ the Redeemer statue, Sugarloaf Mountain, vibrant beaches like Copacabana and Ipanema, and lively samba culture.

locations.name: Amazon Rainforest
locations.description: A vast region of dense tropical rainforest known for unparalleled biodiversity, river exploration, and immersive jungle experiences often based out of remote lodges.

locations.name: Trancoso
locations.description: A chic coastal town in Bahia, known for its beautiful beaches, colourful historic Quadrado (town square), and a blend of rustic charm and understated luxury.
